com.chap.links.client

Class Graph.Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractDrawOptions
      • com.chap.links.client.Graph.Options
  • Enclosing class:
    Graph

    public static class Graph.Options
extends AbstractDrawOptions
    Options for drawing the Graph. Create an instance via the method create, for example Graph.Options options = Graph.Options.create();

      • create

        public static Graph.Options create()

        Returns:
        new instance of Object

      • setAutoDataStep

        public final void setAutoDataStep(boolean autoDataStep)
        If autoDataStep is set to true (default), intermediate data points will be skipped in case of much data. This makes drawing large amounts of data much faster. For example, when the data contains 10000 points, and the width of the graph is 1000 pixels, every tenth datapoint will be drawn and the rest will be skipped.
        Parameters:
        autoDataStep -

      • setWidth

        public final void setWidth(int width)
        Set the width for the chart in pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - Width in pixels

        Set the width for the chart in pixels or percentages.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • setIntervalMin

        @Deprecated
public final void setIntervalMin(long intervalMin)
        Deprecated. 
        Set a minimum interval for the visible range in milliseconds. It will not be possible to zoom in further than this minimum.
        Parameters:
        intervalMin - Minimum interval in milliseconds (default is 10)

      • setZoomMin

        public final void setZoomMin(long zoomMin)
        Set a minimum zoom interval for the visible range in milliseconds. It will not be possible to zoom in further than this minimum.
        Parameters:
        zoomMin - Minimum interval in milliseconds (default is 10)

      • setIntervalMax

        @Deprecated
public final void setIntervalMax(long intervalMax)
        Deprecated. 
        Set a maximum interval for the visible range in milliseconds. It will not be possible to zoom out further than this maximum. Default value equals about 10000 years.
        Parameters:
        intervalMax - Maximum interval in milliseconds

      • setZoomMax

        public final void setZoomMax(long zoomMax)
        Set a maximum zoom interval for the visible range in milliseconds. It will not be possible to zoom out further than this maximum. Default value equals about 10000 years.
        Parameters:
        zoomMax - Maximum zoom interval in milliseconds

      • setScale

        public final void setScale(Graph.Options.SCALE scale,
            double step)
        Set a custom scale. Automatic scaling will be disabled. For example scale=SCALE.MINUTES and step=5 will result in minor steps of 5 minutes, and major steps of an hour. Available scales: MILLISECOND, SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, MONTH, YEAR. As step size, choose for example 1, 2, 5, or 10.
        Parameters:
        scale -
        step -

      • setMoveable

        public final void setMoveable(boolean moveable)
        If true, the Graph can be moved. When the graph moved, the rangechange events are fired.
        Parameters:
        moveable - default: true

      • setZoomable

        public final void setZoomable(boolean zoomable)
        If true (default), the Graph can be zoomed. When the Graph is zoomed, the rangechange event is fired.
        Parameters:
        zoomable - default: true

      • setTooltip

        public final void setTooltip(boolean showTooltip)
        Show a tooltip containing date and value when hovering over a function. True by default.
        Parameters:
        showTooltip - default: true

      • setLegendCheckboxes

        public final void setLegendCheckboxes(boolean visible)
        Enable showing and hiding individual lines in the graph. When enableVisibility is true, checkboxes are added in the legend to show or hide a line. A line can initially be set invisible by setting its visibility to false via the method setLineVisibe.
        Parameters:
        visible - default: false

      • setLegendWidth

        public final void setLegendWidth(java.lang.String width)
        Set the width of the legend
        Parameters:
        width - For example "150px" or "15%". Default: "auto"

      • setLegendWidth

        public final void setLegendWidth(int width)
        Set the width of the legend in pixels
        Parameters:
        width - Default: none

      • setLegendVisibility

        public final void setLegendVisibility(boolean visible)
        Set the visibility of the legend
        Parameters:
        visible - Default: true

      • setLineStyle

        public final void setLineStyle(Graph.Options.LINESTYLE style,
                int linenum)
        Set the line style for the specified line. This overrides the line style set for all lines
        Parameters:
        style - A line style: LINE (default), DOT, or DOTLINE
        linenum - A line number (zero based)

      • setLineStyle

        public final void setLineStyle(Graph.Options.LINESTYLE style)

        Parameters:

      • setLineColor

        public final void setLineColor(java.lang.String color)
        Set one line color for all lines
        Parameters:

      • setLineWidth

        public final void setLineWidth(double width,
                int linenum)
        Set the line width for the specified line Only applicable when the line style is LINE or DOTLINE. This overrides the line width set for all lines
        Parameters:
        width - The width for the line in pixels, for example 2.0. Default: 1.0
        linenum - A line number (zero based)

      • setLineWidth

        public final void setLineWidth(double width)
        Set the line width for all lines Only applicable when the line style is LINE or DOTLINE.
        Parameters:
        width - The width for the lines in pixels, for example 2.0. Default: 1.0

      • setLineRadius

        public final void setLineRadius(double radius,
                 int linenum)
        Set the radius for the dots on the specified line Only applicable when the line style is DOT or DOTLINE. This overrides the line radius set for all lines
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius for dots on the line in pixels. Default: 1.0;
        linenum - A line number (zero based)

      • setLineRadius

        public final void setLineRadius(double radius)
        Set the radius for the dots on all lines Only applicable when the line style is DOT or DOTLINE.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius for dots on the line in pixels. Default: 1.0;

      • setLineLegend

        public final void setLineLegend(boolean visible,
                 int linenum)
        Show or hide the legend for the specified line. This overrides the line legend visibility set for all lines
        Parameters:
        visible - If true, the legend for this line is visible. Default: true
        linenum - A line number (zero based)

      • setLineLegend

        public final void setLineLegend(boolean visible)
        Show or hide the legend for all lines.
        Parameters:
        visible - If true, the legend for all lines are visible. Default: true

      • setLineVisibe

        public final void setLineVisibe(boolean visible,
                 int linenum)
        Show or hide this line. If false, the line is hidden. See also the option enableVisibility, which will add visibility checkboxes in the legend. This overrides the line visibility set for all lines
        Parameters:
        visible - If true, this line will be visible. Default: true
        linenum - A line number (zero based)

      • setLineVisible

        public final void setLineVisible(boolean visible)
        Show or hide all lines. If false, the lines are hidden initially. See also the option enableVisibility, which will add visibility checkboxes in the legend.
        Parameters:
        visible - If true, the lines will be visible. Default: true

      • setLineVisibe

        public final void setLineVisibe(boolean visible)
        Deprecated. Use setLineVisible(visible) instead
        Show or hide all lines. If false, the lines are hidden initially. See also the option enableVisibility, which will add visibility checkboxes in the legend.
        Parameters:
        visible - If true, the lines will be visible. Default: true
